packages.title: Standard (for SMEs only)
packages.description: This package includes all premium features such as A, B, and C.
features: Preparation of Labor Law Documents (PKWT, PKWTT, Termination Agreements, and Power of Attorney) every 3 months
Compliance assistance: Filling out the Investment Activity Report (LKPM)
Free legal training provided every 3 months

packages.title: Premium
packages.description: This package includes standard features such as X, Y, and Z.
features: Preparation of Labor Law Documents (PKWT, PKWTT, Termination Agreements, and Power of Attorney) every 3 months
Preparation of 1 Business Agreement (Sales Agreement, Share Purchase Agreement, MoU, or others) every 3 months
Compliance assistance: Filling out the Investment Activity Report (LKPM)
Free: Legal training provided every 3 months, Filling out monthly corporate tax reports.

packages.title: Ultimate
packages.description: This package includes basic features such as 1, 2, and 3.
features: Unlimited online consultations, including meetings with other parties
Preparation or review of 5 agreements per month
Compliance assistance: Filling out the Investment Activity Report (LKPM) and other technical reports.
Corporate document assistance (GMS/GMSLB, Board of Directors Resolutions, and Shareholders Resolutions)
Free: Legal training provided every 3 months, Filling out annual corporate tax reports.

note.iconText: Payment will be processed every month for 3 consecutive months. Prices do not include Taxes, Transportation Fees, and other costs outside the Services mentioned above (if any).
